meanings.definition: A type of sailing vessel used in Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The prao glided gracefully across the water.
meanings.sent2: We saw a prao docked at the harbor.
meanings.sent3: The prao seemed to dance with the waves.
meanings.sent4: The prao was a majestic swan on the sea.
meanings.sent5: The colorful prao stood out against the blue ocean.

meanings.sent1: We decided to prao to the nearby island.
meanings.sent2: He learned how to prao skillfully.
meanings.sent3: Let's prao our way to adventure!
meanings.sent4: She praoed through the calm waters effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: Praoing under the stars was a magical experience.

meanings.definition: A person who sails in a prao.
meanings.sent1: The experienced prao guided us through the sea.
meanings.sent2: She is a skilled prao who knows the waters well.
meanings.sent3: The prao shared exciting stories of the sea.
meanings.sent4: The prao was a captain of the waves.
meanings.sent5: We trusted the prao to lead us safely on our journey.
